message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $9,500. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't let it go for less than $9,000. This product is truly worth it, and I'm confident you'll see the value in it.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $8,750. Can you consider that?
